Primary Contact: Jennifer Vozenilek, Program Director; Email: kelowna@clarolife.com
Service Details: - Offers a holistic program of support that includes a complete academic program (K-12) through partnership with a distributed learning school, behaviour intervention, life skills training, therapeutic recreation, and opportunities to develop social and emotional awareness- Claro learning centres are devoted to the education of children and youth with Autism Spectrum Disorder (ASD), Fetal Alcohol Spectrum Disorder (FASD), and other neurological and developmental disabilities- After school social skills groups, parent and sibling support and individual Autism therapy are also available at our Kelowna Centre
Cost: Fee for service – may be funded by government or other sources
Address & Map: 1912 Enterprise Way, Units 201 and 203Kelowna, BC     V1Y 9S9
